name: PMPGuide
0:
”Alexa open project management professional guide”
”Alexa, ask project management professional guide to knowledge area project cost management”
”process plan cost management”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: project management professional guide
des:
This is targeted mainly for the PMP aspirant to learn and revise on PMP knowledge areas, process lists, inputs, outputs and Tools and techniques used in each process. This can be used by PMP professionals to revise knowledge on the go or during leisure time.

This Skill is meant to be more interactive with user. This can be used to get details on knowledge area and processes in PMBOK 6. Future versions I Plan to add in more features to virtually ask about process group or any specific input or T&T to get more details.

You can also do monthly subscription for quiz. This will include more than 200 PMP questions. These will change or get updated every month. After buying this product subscription, you can start quiz which will be a set of 5 questions. You can start the quiz as many times as you want and anytime, anywhere. Each time random 5 questions will be presented to you. Please note this in-skill product is only available in US locale for now.

You can open the skill by saying - 'Alexa open project management professional guide' and then you can ask for specific process or knowledge area like
 - List available knowledge areas.
 - knowledge area project cost management
 - process plan cost management


To exist the skill - say cancel or close.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
